paper.title: Computational Method for Claim Portfolio Valuation
paper.abstract: The paper presents method of hybrid prediction system for debt portfolio appraisal. Based on the local area competence, time spread repayment values are predicted by means of hybrid combination of various machine learning techniques. The above methods include among others clustering of references, model selection and enrichment of input variables with prediction outputs from preceding periods. Experimental studies concern the method's configuration influence on its general performance such as number of distinct predictors and number of competence areas.

domain_result.justification: 该论文提出了一种用于债务组合评估的混合预测系统，其核心技术和研究目标集中在投资组合的估值和预测上，属于投资组合管理的范畴。
